entry.title: $2325 // Gorgeous Townhouse Floor-thru Railroad Apartment with Garden Access! N
entry.content:
Lovely floor-thru railroad Apartment on Garden Level of three-family Townhouse.
On 14th Street between 3rd and 4th Avenues.

One interior bedroom with no windows and one larger bedroom -- both with closets.
Sunny front living room with 2 large windows, one closet and an ornamental fireplace.
2 entrances on both ends of apartment.
Eat-in Kitchen overlooks backyard with two large windows.
Nice ceramic-tiled bathroom with full bathtub.
Will be freshly painted.

Beautiful backyard, shared by 3 tenants, complete with shady tree and bbq.
Must see, lovely space!

Great block, great neighborhood.
Near all shopping and restaurants on 3rd Avenue, 4th Avenue and 5th Avenue.
Nearby Park Slope, Prospect Park, Brooklyn Museum, Brooklyn Botanical Gardens, Farmer's Markets, Freddy's Bar & Backroom (with free live music every night!), Greenwood Cemetery, Smith Street, Red Hook, Carroll Gardens, Greenwood Heights, truly situated by so many great hoods!!

Please email me your employment details for an appointment to see it.
Showing Sunday, August 12, 12:30 to 2:00 pm
Available Sept. 1st.

No dogs, cats are welcome, no smoking.
Good credit and employment a must.

First, last, one month security for move-in
$2,325, no fees.
Owner-placed ad.
